data.message: I'm not looking for a superman, or a record deal.  I don't possess any musical talent, and I'm not model material (in society's eyes).  However, I could write my life story with your lyrics.  You have helped me make it through some tough times, and I can only wish for a chance to meet you... <3

replies.message: He doesn't care about your troubles he's making money for a record company.
